t: Amazon.com: Fatworks 100% American Wagyu Tallow, Pit Master Secret Weapon, Certified Wagyu, KETO, PALEO, CARNIVORE, WHOLE30 friendly, Non-Hydrogenated, USA Sourced, 14 oz.
s: NO FALSE CLAIMS: We have seen popular Wagyu Tallow brands make what we feel are false claims, stating “100% Pure Wagyu" when it is not. The USDA allows "Wagyu" to be labelled as "Wagyu"even at only 50% Wagyu bloodlines. For Fatworks, unless it is “Fullblood Japanese Wagyu" it is not 100% Wagyu.
